description:
Sato`s negotiations with the government break down and the U.S. military is called in. Internal tension in the Ajin group leads to a fallout.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: A ce rythme, ce sera vraiment la guerre !
At This Rate... It Really Will Be War!
Kore ja Honto ni Sensou ja Nai Suka
Teraz naprawdę może dojść do wojny
これじゃホントに戦争じゃないすか
